definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: steal (NH id., Aram. [[גְּנַב]], gnab; Ar. janaba is hurt the side, or put aside, den. fr. janbun side)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. sf. [[גְּנׇבַתּוּ]] Job 21:18, Job 27:20, [[גְּנׇבָ֫תַם]] Ge 31:22; 2 ms. [[גׇּנַבְתּ]] Ge 31:30; 1 s. [[וְגׇנַ֑בְתִּי]] consec. Pr 30:9 ; [[גׇּנְֽבוּ]] Jos 7:11, 2Sa 21:12 ; sf. [[גְּנׇבוּךָ]] 2Sa 19:42; Impf. [[יִגְנֽׁב־]] Ex 21:37, [[יִגְנוֹב]] Pr 6:30, [[וַיִּגְנׁב]] Ge 31:20; 3 fs. [[וַתִּגְנׁב]] Ge 31:19 + 2 t.; 2 ms. [[תִּגְנׁב]] Ex 20:15 De 5:17, [[וַתִּגְנׁב]] Ge 31:26, Ge 31:27, [[יִגְנְבוּ]] Ob:Ob 5 , [[תִּגְנׁ֑בוּ]] Le 19:11, [[נִגְנׁב]] Ge 44:8; Inf. abs. [[גׇּנׁב]] Ex 22:11 + 2 t.; Pt. [[גּׁנֵב]] Ex 21:16 + 2 t., [[גׇּנוּב]] Ge 30:33; f. cstr. [[גְּנֻבְֽתִי]] Ge 31:39, Ge 31:39; pl. [[גְּנוּבִים]] Pr 9:17; in Hexateuch always JED, exc. Le 19:11 (H);—steal c. acc. rei Ge 31:19, Ge 31:30, Ge 31:32, Ge 44:8, Ex 21:37, 2Sa 21:12 cf. pass. Ge 30:33, Ge 31:39, Pr 9:17; c. obj. pers. Ex 21:16, De 24:7, 2Sa 19:42; = take by stealth (for good purpose) 2Ki 11:2 = 2Ch 22:11; abs. Ex 20:15 = De 5:17, Le 19:11 Jos 7:11, Pr 6:30, Pr 30:9, Ob:Ob 5, Zec 5:3, cf.Inf. abs. Ho 4:2, Je 7:9 & (c. Niph.) Ex 22:11; [[גנב לֵב]] = deceive Ge 31:20, Ge 31:26 cf Di; [[אׂתִי]] ´[[ג]] Ge 31:27 id.; of sudden sweeping off by storm, in simile Job 21:18 fig. of destruction of wicked Job 27:20.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: be stolen, subj. rei [[גׇּנׁב יִגׇּנֵב]] Ex 22:11.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: steal away (trans.) [[וַיְגַגֵּב אבשׁלום את־לֵב]] 2Sa 15:6; [[מְגַנְּבֵי דְּבָרַי]] Je 23:30.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: be stolen away subj. pers. [[גֻּנּׁב גֻּנַּבְתִּי]] Ge 40:15; subj. rei [[וְגֻנַּב]] consec. Ex 22:6; be brought by stealth Job 4:12. [[יְגֻנׇּ֑ב]].

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: go by stealth, steal away [[יִתְגַּנֵּב]] 2Sa 19:4, [[וַיִּתְגַּנֵּב]] 2Sa 19:4. (Syr. gnab nap4eh steal oneself away; so 0tgnb Ge 31:27.)
